casebody.data:
Meghan R. JOHNSON v. SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA UNIVERSITY and Paige Lapeyrouse Hall NO. 2016-CC-2252 Supreme Court of Louisiana.

Supreme Court of Louisiana

February 24, 2017

Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of E. Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 632,266; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2016 CW 1228

h Denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant. GENOVESE, J., would grant.
